definitions.definition: To draw in the breath suddenly, as if from a shock.
definitions.example: The audience gasped as the magician disappeared.
We were all gasping when we reached the summit.

definitions.definition: To speak in a breathless manner.
definitions.example: The old man gasped his last few words.

definitions.definition: To pant with eagerness; to show vehement desire.
definitions.example: I'm gasping for a cup of tea.
